common.longPressHint: Finya hiyo sammo kwa kagidhaa ndiyo ichapishe fom

splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.description: Saka Ofisi za IEBC Na Hii Sammo Yetu, Si Unadiglo?
splash.disclaimer: Tuwai location ndiyo tudrop pin za IEBC offices zile karibu na directions za na huko.
splash.allowLocation: Manze Tuwai Pin ya mahali uko
splash.locationBlocked: Ni kama umetulisha block. Hatuoni location yako.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Ebu seti location on kwa browser alafu uload tena
splash.switchToLight: Tumia page ikiwa hivi masaa za asubuhi
splash.switchToDark: Tumia page hivi mausiku macho yako isichomeke sana

search.placeholder: Saka office za IEBC kwa county, constituency, ama location uko...
search.findAllMatching: Sakanya ofisi zote copy-paste za IEBC
search.noMatchQuery: Hakuna office zimematch na "{{query}}". Ebu zisake na word ingine.
search.noOfficesInArea: Ni kaa mahali uko, ni ku-barren. Hakuna office hapo.
search.useCurrentLocation: Saka na mahali umesimama sai sai

office.noLocationAccess: Manze hatukuoni. Ni ka umezima location ama ni kwenu mmekaziwa?
office.nearby: Ni kaa kona moja hivi ufike
office.driveAway: Ni distance ya gari ya chwani

bottomSheet.locationAccessRequired: Itabidi tupate hiyo access ya location
bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Washa location access ndiyo ucheki itakuwa mangapi, upate directions za kutoka mahali uko sai sai, na alafu upewe shorti ya kufika hii office.
bottomSheet.estimatedRideCost: Oya! Ni ka kufika huko itakuwa na hii cost, tumekuestimate-ia
bottomSheet.normalTraffic: Jam ni ile normal tu, si unajua waKenya
bottomSheet.baseFare: Bei yake ukitoa stori mob za juu
bottomSheet.perKmRate: Ongeza za kabej [mafuta ya kila km]
bottomSheet.contributeLocation: Tusaidie na Location Umecheki Enyewe Hatuna
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Community inaweza confirm kama office hii ni sammo ya kweli au tumewaKasongo
bottomSheet.peopleConfirmed_one: Mtu {{count}} ameconfirm location hii ni true
bottomSheet.peopleConfirmed_other: Watu {{count}} wameconfirm location hii ni true
bottomSheet.within500m: Lazma uwe karibu na hivi mita 500 kutoka kwa office
bottomSheet.locationNotStored: Location yako hatujaiseti kokote. Hatukuwangi ivyo
bottomSheet.oneConfirmation: Sammo moja. Confirmation moja. Si unadilgo?
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Na si umestep! Umeuma nje na mita {{distance}}. Karibia ufike mita {{maxDistance}} kutoka kwa office ndiyo confirmation iingiane
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Oya! Imebant kuconfirm. Cheki, jitume utry tena.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Location permission inahitajika kuthibitisha. Tafadhali washa location access ujaribu tena.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Tap sammo upate directions za Google Maps.
bottomSheet.bestRoute: Si ni si tunakushow; songa na hii njia ya {{distance}} km, na utafika na hivi dakika {{time}}

layers.baseMap: Map bila stori mingi za juu
layers.standardDesc: View ya default ya map ya barabara
layers.satelliteDesc: View ya picha ukicheki chini kama astronaut
layers.dataLayers: Layers Juu Ya Map Ukiseti Data
layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Location zote za office za IEBC Kenya nzima
layers.constituenciesDesc: Hii inakushow ma-border zote za Constituencies Kenya yote venye IEBC ilizipanga. Kila place (polygon) ina-represent constituency moja na code yake na jina pia.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Tumesakanya places zote ambazo ni hosi au dispe Kenya yote (Chunga! Hii sammo ni bigi - itakaa kaa ikiload)
layers.countiesDesc: Hii inakushow ma-border zote za Counties Kenya yote venye IEBC ilizipanga. Kila place (polygon) ina-represent county moja.
layers.myLocationDesc: Onyesha location ya Mine but kwa map.
layers.locationPermissionRequired: Tuwai permission kupata location ya place uko
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Washa na uzime layers ili utengeneze view ya map yako. Unaweza kupiga mix ma-data layers mob na base maps tofauti tofauti kwa experience fiti zaidi.

contribute.title: Saidiana na Location ya Office Umepata Hatuna
contribute.description: Tusaidie kuseti mappings za office zote za IEBC Kenya nzima kwa kusaidiana na data ile true kabisa ya place.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Paste link ya Google Maps ama coordinates
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Picha za office, landmark hivi hivi, au za hiyo place ime-neighbour office ndiyo tuconfirm
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Vruta alafu achilia ama ukafinye ndiyo i-upload
contribute.additionalInfo: 5. Stori Za Juu. Na Si Jaba, sindio? (But si Lazima)
contribute.reviewAndSubmit: 7. Cheki Ka Iko Fiti Alafu Submit
contribute.movePin: Vruta pin ili useti kwa location true kwa maps
contribute.locationAccuracyFair: Hii location yako iko sawa, but room for improvement iko
contribute.locationAccuracyPoor: Hii location yako... ama tutry tena?
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Manze si thanks! Umesubmit fiti na sasa tunaconfirm kila kitu kabla ku-update kwa Maps. Tegea tu, utaiona!
contribute.submissionNote: Kumbuka: Ni juu ya effort kama hizi za kuconfirm locations kama ni true ndiyo #NasakaIEBC inakuwa fiti hata zaidi. So manze, asante kwa help yako!
contribute.errorLocation: Cheki, ebu seti location ya office vifiti
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Coordinates zako zimebant. Try ku-confirm latitude na longitude vifiti. Uko tu sawa bythaa.
contribute.gettingLocation: Ndo sisi hao tunapata location yako...
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Venye umetuwai permission ni kaa haijawork. Ebu cheki ka kuna sammo inablock location yako kushare-iwa.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Imeshindwa kupata location. Ama useti coordinates we mwenyewe.
contribute.parseError: Hiyo link haiwezi manze. Try copy-paste link fiti ya Google Maps au coordinates za place directly.

uber.noDiscount: (Jua Tume-Estimate Bila Kutoa Za Discount. Bei Yenyewe Tu!)
uber.chapChapDesc: Uber Baridi - Sammo fast na haiumizi walenje
uber.uberXDesc: Ni Uber fiti ya Kufika Mbio, Hata ukiwa Solo
uber.comfortDesc: Panga Kufikanga Bila Stress, Plus Iko Na Legroom Fiti
uber.priceUnavailable: Ni Kaa Bei Imefanya Ile Kitu
